Title: TYPO3 Arbitrary Shell Execution in Swiftmailer library
Description:
The swiftmailer library in use allows to execute arbitrary shell commands if the "From" header comes from a non-trusted source and no "Return-Path" is configured. Affected are only TYPO3 installation the configuration option
```
$GLOBALS['TYPO3_CONF_VARS']['MAIL']['transport']
```
is set to "sendmail". Installations with the default configuration are not affected.
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 4.5.0 before 4.5.37, all versions starting from 4.7.0 before 4.7.20, all versions starting from 6.1.0 before 6.1.12, all versions starting from 6.2.0 before 6.2.6
NotImpacted: All versions before 4.5.0, all versions starting from 4.5.37 before 4.7.0, all versions starting from 4.7.20 before 6.1.0, all versions starting from 6.1.12 before 6.2.0, all versions starting from 6.2.6
